name: Space Gladiators (SkyKing)
description:
You are fighting in an arena in a city orbiting the Earth. Your enemies are Holofighters. They do have 3 healthpoints, you must hit them 3 times before they can be defeated. But you can also use your rovenades which take them down immediately. You start with 5 rovenades and gain 2 rovenades with every 5 kills.

Controls:

Left Arrow -- Move Left

Right Arrow -- Move Right

X -- Hit

C -- Use Rovenade

Enjoy it an let me now how you find it so far!

(Game still in development, unfortunately no audio and some bugs)
